property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone or whenever this creature taps, choose one of your shields and one of your opponent's. This creature breaks those chosen shields. ■ All Metallica and Judgment Emblems added to your hand from your shields gets "shield trigger".

property.name: Rules
property.value: {NEO EVOLUTION}: You may put it on one of your Light creatures. (If a creature is under it, treat it as a Neo Evolution Creature.) {KIZUNA} (When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may use one of your creature's Kizuna abilities.) type=plus|Draw a card. Then cast a spell that costs 5 or less from your hand for no cost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ At the end of each of your turns, choose one of the following: ► Draw a card: ► Put a creature that costs the same as or less than the number of cards in your hand from your hand into the battle zone. ■ Labyrinth: Whenever an opponent's creature attacks, if you have more shields than your opponent, you may untap one of your creatures. If you do, change the attack of your opponent's creature to that creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Your spells may each cost 1 less to cast. They can't cost 0 or less. ■ You may cast a spell from your graveyard once per turn. After you cast, put it on the bottom of your deck instead of your graveyard. ■ Whenever you cast a spell, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever this creature taps during your turn, skip the rest of the turn. ■ Whenever this creature untaps, break 2 of your opponent's shields. ■ Whenever this creature is attacked, it gets +10000 power until the end of the turn. ■ When your opponent would choose a creature in the battle zone by the effect of a spell, they can't choose this one.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {NEO EVOLUTION}: You may put it on one of your Darkness creatures. (If a creature is under it, treat it as a Neo Evolution Creature.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever this creature attacks, destroy it after the attack. ■ When this creature is put into your graveyard, if it was an evolution creature, return it into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules

Then draw a card.) {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever this creature attacks, after the attack, each player may discard their hand. Those players draw 3 cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone from your hand, put it into your mana zone. When its put out from a zone other than your hand, choose one of your opponent's creatures and put it into its owner's mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When one of your opponent's creatures would be destroyed while battling with this creature, tap it instead. That creature doesn't untap during the start of your opponent's next turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {NEO EVOLUTION}: You may put it on one of your Light creatures. (If a creature is under it, treat it as a Neo Evolution Creature.) {KIZUNA} (When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may use one of your creature's Kizuna abilities.) type=plus|Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may choose a spell from among them, show that spell to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ You may put a non-evolution light creature that costs 5 or less from your hand into the battle zone. ■ Labyrinth: If you have more shields than your opponent, you may put a non-evolution Metallica that costs 8 or less from your hand into the battle zone tapped.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SUPER SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost. Then if you have no shields, you may use this card's Super Shield Trigger ability.) ■ Choose 3 of your opponent's creatures and tap them. {SUPER}Your opponent's creatures don't untap at the start of their next turn.

property.name: Rules

property.name: Rules

property.name: Rules

At the end of your next turn, you lose the game.
